slide.title: Private

list.bullet: Can only be called from the same class

slide.example:
<?php

	class Bedroom {
		private $action;

		function __construct() {
			$this->action = 'fun';
		}
	}

	$br = new Bedroom();
	echo $br->action. "\n";

? >
Fatal error: Cannot access private property bedroom::$action in - on line 12
